cont.entity_a: The yogurt maker often heats up to 130 degrees, which is too hot and curdles the milk. The high temperature kills beneficial bacteria in the yogurt. The appliance is essentially a warmer with no temperature control. The jars get very hot to the touch after use. The appliance can overheat, affecting yogurt quality.
cont.entity_b: The yogurt maker is reliable and maintains a constant temperature for incubation. The appliance can overheat, affecting yogurt quality.

cont.entity_a: The product description is misleading as it lacks a functional timer. There is no automatic timer or temperature control. The appliance lacks a timer, requiring manual time tracking.
cont.entity_b: The product lacks a timer or automatic shut-off feature.

cont.entity_a: The plastic lid's insulation is unimpressive. The jars are curved, making it difficult to fit a small spatula under the rim. Condensation forms on the inside of the lid, which can drip into the yogurt. The center jar experiences condensation issues due to lid design.
cont.entity_b: The inner container can be difficult to manage without spilling. The yogurt maker's inner lid can loosen, causing spills.

cont.entity_a: The appliance size is suitable for single-person use.
cont.entity_b: The appliance can make up to 2 quarts of yogurt at a time. The yogurt maker works well for making large batches of yogurt.

cont.entity_a: The yogurt maker stops working after 7 months.

Usability.comm: The appliance is generally easy to use and clean.

cont.entity_b: The yogurt maker's simplicity makes it easy to use. The thermometer provided is difficult to read. The product is easy to use, but a dimmer switch may be needed for temperature control.

Flavor.comm: The yogurt tastes better than store-bought and is more cost-effective.

cont.entity_a: The yogurt maker produces yogurt with good flavor and consistency in 3-4 hours. The machine is easy to use and makes perfect vegan yogurt with soy milk.
cont.entity_b: It consistently produces high-quality yogurt. The appliance is highly recommended for making SCD-friendly yogurt. The yogurt maker is effective for producing creamy and thick yogurt.

Cost.comm: The yogurt maker is cost-effective, allowing savings compared to store-bought yogurt.

cont.entity_b: The appliance is cost-efficient and saves money over time.

cont.entity_a: The jars are made of glass, avoiding contact with plastic. The glass jars are not suitable for boiling water sterilization.
cont.entity_b: It includes a thermometer and cloth for straining.
The yogurt maker works well with lactose-free milk. The yogurt maker requires manual temperature monitoring.
